title: Rengar vs Ekko
body: Hey LoL players. I'm a lvl 21 player on the NA server. I'm really split between Ekko and Rengar. I mostly have mid laners, and I main and am good at Zed and Yasuo. Sorta good at Akali. I know that Rengar is a top and jungle champ, and Ekko is a mid and top champ. I like both their kits. Who would you say is more fun and rewarding and has more carry potential if played right. Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
If you are looking for a more fun champion to play i would say ekko would be the most funnest champion to play as you can juke and outplay, saying that you can mainly single handedly carry games/teamfights with ekko where as Rengar if you are more for making people rage by 1 shotting them and keeping them dead for the whole game (as a Rengar main its fun make them squirm for mercy). AND please don't go full ap ekko if you decide to go him its not useful in team fights he just gets bursted down so fast i find this build work the best, {{item:1402}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3001}} and depending on if you are vsing full ad or more ap damage go {{item:3110}} vs more ad or {{item:3065}} vsing more ap damage and seeing as lissandra is now being played more now its a good item as well on him it lets him heal more with his ultimate. 
Hope you have fun mate :)
If you want i can help you with rengar builds as well if you decide to play him
Thanks for the info on AP. I played against an Ekko that did that, and he did tons of damage but as you said very squishy. What makes you want to be a Rengar main over other champs?

Rengar is a bit easier to play, and can carry pretty darn hard when fed. I guess it's the same for Ekko, just being harder to play, but since you can play Zed and Yasuo well, I'd recommend Ekko. Better outplay potential, imo.
